wikipedia_page.main: John Clayton (23 April 1907–unknown) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Carlisle United, Chesterfield, Mansfield Town and Wrexham.

response: *John Clayton (sportswriter) (born 1954), writer and reporter for ESPN and SportsCenter
*John Clayton, Lord Greystoke, birthname of the fictional character Tarzan
*John Clayton (town clerk) (1792–1890), antiquarian and town clerk of Newcastle upon Tyne, England
*John Clayton (rugby union) (1848–1924), England rugby union player
*John Clayton (1657–1725), rector of Crofton, West Yorkshire, and scientific author
*John Clayton (divine) (1709–1773), English cleric, Methodist and Jacobite
